iqtprm::CSelectableGuiComp

Detailed Description

Component to show any selected GUI, implemented as observer of iprm::ISelectionParam.

The view for no selection

virtual void iqtprm::CSelectableGuiComp::UpdateEditor ( int  updateFlags = 0  )  [virtual]

Updates editor with model data.

This method will be called only if GUI is connected.

Parameters:
updateFlags the same as changeFlag in istd::IChangeable.
